extracted_playbook.condition: Is it possible to update to FW11?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Firmware FW11
extracted_playbook.description: Update the device firmware to FW11, which contains the fix for the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable I/O-Check Service
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the I/O-Check service as it is only needed during installation and commissioning, not during normal operations.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the device and ensure it is not directly connected to the internet.
